An automatic machine or device is one which has controls that enable it to perform a task without needing to be constantly operated by a person. Automatic methods and processes involve the use of such machines.
An automatic action is one that you do without thinking about it.
If something such as an action or a punishment is automatic, it happens without people needing to think about it because it is the result of a fixed rule or method.
An automatic is a gun that keeps firing shots until you stop pulling the trigger.
An automatic is a car in which the gears change automatically as the car's speed increases or decreases.
